changeSet.author: sunbiz
changeSet.sql: EXEC sp_msforeachtable "ALTER TABLE ? NOCHECK CONSTRAINT all";

column.name: description
column.value: Group of persons related by common descent or heredity

column.name: description
column.value: Country of which this person is a member

column.name: description
column.value: First or last name of this person's mother

column.name: description
column.value: District/region in which this patient' home health center resides

column.name: description
column.value: Specific Location of this person's home health center.

column.name: description
column.value: Numeric value, including integer or float (e.g., creatinine, weight)

column.name: description
column.value: Value determined by term dictionary lookup (i.e., term identifier)

column.name: description
column.value: Not associated with a datatype (e.g., term answers, sets)

column.name: description
column.value: Pointer to a binary or text-based document (e.g., clinical document, RTF, XML, EKG, image, etc.) stored in complex_obs table

column.name: description
column.value: Complex value. Analogous to HL7 Embedded Datatype

column.name: description
column.value: Developers of the OpenMRS .. have additional access to change fundamental structure of the database model.

column.name: description
column.value: All users with the 'Provider' role will appear as options in the default Infopath

column.name: description
column.value: Privileges gained once authentication has been established.

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add a cohort to the system

column.value: Able to add concept proposals to the system

column.value: Able to add patients to programs

column.value: Able to add users to OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add a cohort to the system

column.name: description
column.value: Able to delete concept proposals from the system

column.name: description
column.value: Able to delete patients from programs

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add a cohort to the system

column.value: Able to edit concept proposals in the system

column.name: description
column.value: Able to edit patients in programs

column.name: description
column.value: Able to change the passwords of users in OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Able to edit users in OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Allows user to access Form Entry pages/functions

column.name: description
column.value: Allows user to upload and edit the xsns stored on the server

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add/edit/delete patient identifier types

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add/remove modules to the system

column.name: description
column.value: Able to add/edit/delete person attribute types

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Demographics' tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Encounters' tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Allows user to view the Forms tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Graphs' tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Overview' tab on the patient dashboard

column.value: Able to view the 'Summary' tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Regimen' tab on the patient dashboard

column.name: description
column.value: Allows user to upload/overwrite the XSNs defined for forms

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the 'Administration' link in the navigation bar

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view concept proposals to the system

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view data entry statistics from the admin screen

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view global properties on the administration screen

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view patient identifier types

column.name: description
column.value: Ability to see the navigation menu

column.name: description
column.value: Able to see which programs that patients are in

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view person attribute types

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view and fill out unpublished forms

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view users in OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view problems in OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view allergies in OpenMRS

column.name: description
column.value: Relationship from a primary care provider to the patient

column.name: description
column.value: Relationship between brother/sister, brother/brother, and sister/sister

column.name: description
column.value: Relationship from a mother/father to the child

column.name: description
column.value: Relationship from a parent's sibling to a child of that parent

column.name: description
column.value: Acq. during patient encounter (vitals, labs, etc.)

column.name: description
column.value: Terms which don't fit other categories

column.name: description
column.value: Observation that can be reported from patient or found on exam

column.name: description
column.value: Orderable items which aren't tests or drugs

column.name: description
column.value: Number given out prior to the OpenMRS system (No check digit)

column.name: description
column.value: name to use when nothing else is available

column.name: description
column.value: preferred short name for a concept

column.name: description
column.value: a different word with similar meaning

column.name: description
column.value: An order for a medication to be given to the patient

column.name: description
column.value: An Allergy the Patient may have

column.name: description
column.value: A Problem the Patient may have

column.name: description
column.value: Iterates through the concept dictionary, re-creating the concept index (which are used for searcing). This task is started when using the 'Update Concept Index Storage' page and no range is given. This task stops itself when one iteration has completed.
